sra: Add a check for PAIRED LibraryLayout to determine is_paired

Paired read samples are often mislabelled as SINGLE, but not the other way
around.

Add --rerun flag to various metadata download tasks

This is useful to update the metadata.

Mark paired_reads parameter in FastqDump as insignificant

As we use --split-e, it does not make any difference on the actual command that
is run, only on which output files are picked up.

submission. It is not implemented at this moment, so we use a WrapperTask to
override the run() definition to be based solely on the
GenerateReportForExperiment task completedness.

Move ignore_mate into TrimSample task

This solves the issue that arise when one mate is less than 25bp resulting in
all reads being filtered out by cutadapt. If ignore_mate is used, the data will
be considered as a single-end dataset at the trimming stage.

initial startup time since per-sample tasks are discovered dynamically.

Added exclusion and inclusion options

Include/Exclude works by specifying a path to files of lists of samples to include/exclude. Currently, this is launched with something like:
 $ EXCLUDEME=excludeme INCLUDEME=includeme bash -c './multiple_rsem.sh /space/grp/mbelmadani/rnaseq-pipeline/Data/GSE12946 GSE12946'
